description:
USN-3554-1 fixed vulnerabilities in curl.  This update
provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 It was discovered that curl could accidentally leak authentication data.
 An attacker could possibly use this to get access to sensitive information.
 (CVE-2018-1000007)

curl.description: HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP client and client libraries

title: curl vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: curl could be made to expose sensitive information.
